website_summaries.verdict: The Rawlings alloy bat is one to consider for versatility. It can be used from high school through casual adult league play, with numerous sizes and weights available.
pros: Significant amount of pop and noise with solid hits
Affordable price point without sacrificing power
cons: Very loud ping on contact, noisy for indoor practice
Can develop a curve over time

customer_reviews.title: Bat seems to have good pop and feels light for my son
customer_reviews.text: Bat seems to have good pop and feels light for my son. My only concern is while taking off the shrink wrap off the grip, the grip "peeled" a little too. See pic. Not sure if this is normal.
customer_reviews.author: DanHalen

customer_reviews.title: Piiiiiinggggg. This bat has pop, square up the ...
customer_reviews.text: Piiiiiinggggg. This bat has pop, square up the ball and smash it.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: good bat but didn't hold up long
customer_reviews.text: The bat was great however only after about a month of use the bat developed a curve in it. This is the first time we have ever had a bat do this. We are sending it back to see if the warranty covers this but in the mean time we had to purchase another one because we don't have time to wait on the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: dustdeyt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 230 lb 17 yes
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Perfect fit for my 230 lb 17 yes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Attwood

customer_reviews.title: This bat hits very well but it is LOUD. ...
customer_reviews.text: This bat hits very well but it is LOUD. If you are hitting indoors, everyone will know what bat you are using... and want one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: First game today (HS varsity) and went 2 for 4. Temps in the 50's. Great pop (ball jumps off bat) and killer sound.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Beard

customer_reviews.title: Smooth swinging bat with God pop!
customer_reviews.text: This bat is very balanced and is easy to stay smooth through the hitting zone. Able to generate good bat speed and extension after contact. I like this bat very much!
customer_reviews.author: J. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Best bat he has ever used
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bat! Best bat he has ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best values in BBCOR bats. My son is a freshman in HS and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bat for the the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bat for the the price. The balance and weight placement is perfect. My son has used it for 3 weeks now hitting multiple shots in the air around 270+ ft being a 12 yr old. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: scott critzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bat has a lot of pop in it. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He likes the sound it makes when the ball comes off the sweet spot of the bat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the 5150 series and has used it for many years. He likes the sound it makes when the ball comes off the sweet spot of the bat.
customer_reviews.author: kevin white

customer_reviews.title: this is by far the best bat for the money
customer_reviews.text: As far as BBCOR goes, this is by far the best bat for the money. No other bat even comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bat
customer_reviews.text: Good bat. It does have a piercing sound on impact which makes it tough on the ears when hitting indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kaatz

customer_reviews.title: Coach recommended! Kid approved!
customer_reviews.text: My son, 14, loves this bat! His coach recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: missy heiser

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bat it is perfect for him. Balanced bat.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Tijerina

customer_reviews.title: POP
customer_reviews.text: My son has been extremely pleased with this bat.... Tons of pop!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I guess the 5150 would be great for batting practice or bunting
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 5150 and the Velo for my son. The Velo is worth the extra $100 !!! I guess the 5150 would be great for batting practice or bunting.
customer_reviews.author: #1stunner

customer_reviews.title: When you take the clear plastic wrapping off of the ...
customer_reviews.text: When you take the clear plastic wrapping off of the handle grip, the grip rips off. Now off to sports store to buy new handle grip bc there is no time to return bat before season starts.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Merrell

customer_reviews.title: 2015 UVA College Championship Team used this bat
customer_reviews.text: 2015 UVA College Championship Team used this bat. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

product_meta.title: Rawlings BBR53-3 5150 Alloy Bbcor Approved High School/Collegiate Baseball Bat
product_meta.description: The 5150 is still one of the most loved bat models created! The redesigned 2016 model is here to offer a traditional feel that batters are used to feeling with a 5150 but all the best and latest tech! The composite end cap adds to one of the lightest full alloy bat builds around. The bat improves a hitters swing speed and allows for added barrel flex! All around a great choice. Specifications: -3 Length to weight ratio 2 5/8 Inch Barrel Diameter BBCOR Certified Aerospace-Grade 5150 One-Piece Alloy Construction Balanced Swing Weight with a -3 length to weight ratio Precision-Optimized-Performance (pOp) Technology Comp-Lite Composite End cap
feature_bullets: Comp-lite - composite end cap creates balance for faster swing speed
Ultra responsive, aerospace-grade Rawlings 5150 alloy for ultimate performance and durability
